Posts.EditableText:
So i have player chosing actions from a repeatable menu done

Ex: stretch, meditate, weightlift, & squats.

I have a script under each to remove it once chosen.

What i whould like is a new option to be added once all of these 4 are used: Rest. 

How whould i make this work?
